attributes.action: Give citizenship to all White south African Farmers facing Racial discrimination
attributes.additional_details: You only have to do a search on any eastern hemisphere news site or african news outlet to find stories and talk, the SA gov are not hiding the fact this is going to happen.
attributes.background:
White Farmers have been racially targeted The South African Gov have seen fit to make taking white farm land legal with no compensation and are likely to be killed as so many have already.
It is our duty to grant them safety and citizenship.
South Africa must be expelled from the commonwealth.

rejection.details: People from South Africa are already able to apply for a visa to live and work in the UK, or for British citizenship, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
